name: a farmer and his fields, bound together
name_original: a farmer and his fields, bound together
description:
left foot = z/c/n
right foot = x/v/m
facing the direction of arrows

Play as a farmer in the harvest season of the wheat. 
The game ends when you are tired of your life as a farmer or you are died of oldness.

I made this little game to depict the picture of a poor farmer’s repatitive and tiring life.
Inspiration is drawn from my grandpa and other relatives who worked on their fields for their entire life.

Thankfully life has been getting better.

**spoiler: death after 60 years of hard work in a row.

Entry of Ludum Dare 52: Harvest.
